quest.name: Daughter of the Deep
journal: Yugiri is at a loss for words.
objectives: Find a suitable place for the imperial decurion.
Use Yugiri's medicine on the imperial decurion.
Find a suitable place for the imperial soldier.
Use Yugiri's medicine on the imperial soldier.
Return with Yugiri to the House of the Fierce.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Apologies, Forename. I was...lost in thought.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Mayhap they have the right of it. Mayhap we are fools for urging them to rise once more. Yet I believe─I have to believe─that in their heart of hearts, they...they still...

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: ...Now is not the time. We must finish what we started.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: I have in my possession a powerful medicine that befuddles the mind and memories. We must administer it to the soldiers ere they wake.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: The medicine will leave the soldiers confused and unable to clearly recall recent events. They will suspect that they fell asleep at their posts and be reluctant to discuss it with others.

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: It is naught more than a temporary measure, but we dare not kill them for the sake of the villagers. Tend to the last two I put to sleep─I shall see to the others.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERC02495
dialogue.text: <snore> ...MotherFather, is that you...?

dialogue.name: YUGIRI
dialogue.text: Come, come! We must tell the others of this airship, or hear what they know of it!
